2.title: Onboarding in progress
2.text:
1.Prepare an application for your onboadring to the vendor pool
2. Submit an application
3. Wait for the decision of the vendor pool owner.

4.title: Suspended onboarding
4.text: The vendor pool owner has temporarily excluded your company from the vendor pool.
4.advice: Advice: Contact the vendor pool owner or prepare a new application for onboarding.

5.title: Expired onboarding
5.advice: Advice: Prepare a new application for onboarding.

6.title: Your company has been excluded from the vendor pool

7.title: Your company has refused onboarding
7.advice: Advice: Prepare a new application for onboarding.

actions.refuse: Refuse onboarding to the vendor pool

submit.title: Apply
submit.text: Apply for onboarding to the vendor pool?
submit.success_snack: The application has been sent for consideration

invitation.title: Begin onboarding to the vendor pool

no_application.title: Your company did not fill out the application form for onboarding to the vendor pool.
no_application.text:
Possible reasons:
  • • The application did not contain a questionnaire at the time of submission
  • • The vendor pool owner onboarded your company without submitting an application

not_accredited_in_related_error.title: Application submission unavailable
not_accredited_in_related_error.list_title: Complete onboarding to the vendor pool:
not_accredited_in_related_error.requirement: The requirement is specified by the vendor pool owner in the Terms for Onboarding section.

obsolete.title: Application is out of date
obsolete.text: The vendor pool owner has updated the questionnaire. Update your application. Make sure that all sections of the application are ready and repeat the action.

block_is_not_complete.title: Application form not completed
block_is_not_complete.text: Complete the questionnaire and repeat the action.

request_acceptance_closed.title: Application submission unavailable
request_acceptance_closed.text: Acceptance of applications has been completed.
request_acceptance_closed.notice: Do you have any questions? Contact the owner of the vendor pool.

blocked.title: Application submission unavailable
blocked.text: Your company has been removed from the vendor pool. Refresh the page to see details.
